feedback.correct: Correct! JavaScript is an interpreted language, not compiled.
feedback.incorrect: JavaScript is interpreted at runtime, not compiled beforehand.

questions.question: Can CSS be used to create animations?

feedback.correct: Yes! CSS3 introduced animation and transition properties.
feedback.incorrect: CSS can indeed create animations using @keyframes and transitions.

questions.question: Is Big O notation used to describe space complexity?

feedback.correct: Correct! Big O describes both time and space complexity.
feedback.incorrect: Big O notation is used for both time complexity and space complexity analysis.

feedback.correct: Correct! Some NoSQL databases enforce schemas (e.g., column-family stores).
feedback.incorrect: While many NoSQL databases are schema-flexible, not all are completely schema-less.

feedback.correct: Yes! TCP provides reliable, ordered delivery with error checking.
feedback.incorrect: TCP is a reliable protocol that guarantees data delivery through acknowledgments and retransmission.
